attributes.action: stop airlines charging a debit/credit card fee per sector and per passenger rather than per booking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some low cost airlines are currently charging customers debit/credit card fees for each sector (ie outgoing/ingoing) and for each passenger rather than add a single fee to the booking. In other words a booking for 4 return flights carries a charge of 8 times the normal debit/credit card fee which is excessive and unjustifiable.
